item.description:
Hi Everyone,
FREE TICKETS are available to Boston International/Arthouse
Movie Meetup Group members for this Saturday, December 2, 2:00
pm matinee. See below for how to make reservations.

I am not sure of the number of tickets that are available and please reserve seats and RSVP "Yes" only if you are sure you can attend. If a good number of people can make it, I'll make reservations at a Harvard Square locale. If not, we'll just wing it.

The American Repertory Theatre invites you to WINGS OF DESIRE,
a world premiere stage adaptation of Wim Wenders' award-winning
movie featuring music by Andy Moor (The Ex), live news reader
Robin Young (WBUR), and Mam Smith, a professional aerialist.
WINGS OF DESIRE is a co-production with Toneelgroep Amsterdam.
Prior to its U.S. debut, the production has played to audiences
in Amsterdam and toured throughout The Netherlands and Belgium.
de Groene Amsterdammer calls it "a magnificent viewing
experience!"

The performance lasts approximately 1 hour, 45 minutes.

To make a reservation, please complete the following form:

http://www.amrep.org/...

The deadline for RSVPing is Friday at 5pm. You will receive a
final confirmation by Saturday morning at 9am. Tickets will be
ready for pickup the day of the show (Saturday, December 2nd at
noon).

IMPORTANT: Subject to availability. Limit two tickets per
person. Tickets may be picked up beginning at noon on the day
of the selected performance. Any tickets that have not been
claimed by fifteen minutes prior to curtain will be released.
Seats are assigned on a first-come, first-served basis when
tickets are picked up, so arrive early for the best selection.

To learn more about WINGS OF DESIRE, visit
http://www.amrep.org/... where you can download video and
audio podcasts featuring interviews with Associate Artistic
Director Gideon Lester and actor Bernard White; read the
ARTblog, including daily posts from Bernard White, and see
photos of the production during its European tour.
item.name: Members Only: Free Tickets for "Wings of Desire"A.R.T. Theater Production
